thread.title: China Launches Probe Over U.S. Sorghum Imports

author: wsjcom
title: China Launches Probe Over U.S. Sorghum Imports
text:
China’s Commerce Ministry said Sunday that it initiated an anti-dumping and anti-subsidy investigation after preliminarily finding that heavy volumes and low prices of American exports of sorghum, bolstered by U.S. government subsidies, hurt Chinese growers.
In announcing the action, the Commerce Ministry didn’t mention the Trump administration’s recent ruling to place tariffs on imports of Chinese solar panels. Chinese officials have told representatives of U.S. businesses that Beijing is preparing tit-for-tat measures to... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
